metadata.title: BonSjoerd - Branding, design & web development
metadata.description: Hello, I am Sjoerd Boerrigter. A freelance designer & web developer from the Netherlands, living in Sarlat-la-Canéda in the south of France.

hero.title: Hello, I am Sjoerd
hero.text: I am a freelance designer & web developer from the Netherlands, living in Sarlat-la-Canéda in the south of France. I'm still learning French, but I am good at branding, design & web development. In my free time I am renovating our 150 year old house.

projects.text1: I love to help businesses to define their brand identity and present themselves in an attractive way. I can help you to stand out to your ideal clients and use the internet to attract new customers.
projects.text2: I have XXXX years experience as designer & web developer, building modern websites using Sketch, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS and WordPress. So, don't hesitate to contact me if you want to grow your business!

footer.title: Get in touch
footer.text: Don't hesitate to contact me if you need help with branding, design or web development. I am happy to help where I can!
